trans-unit.source: Controls access to non-public types and members through the <see cref="N:System.Reflection" /> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="N:System.Reflection" /> API 控制对非公共类型和成员的访问。

trans-unit.source: Controls some features of the <see cref="N:System.Reflection.Emit" /> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 控制 <see cref="N:System.Reflection.Emit" /> API 的一些功能。

trans-unit.source: Without <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>, code can use reflection to access only the public members of objects.
trans-unit.target: 而无需<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>，代码可以使用反射来访问对象的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Code with <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> and the appropriate <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag> flags can access the `protected` and `private` members of objects.
trans-unit.target: 代码与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>适当<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag>标志可以访问`protected`和`private`对象的成员。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> can provide access to non-public types and members, we recommend that you do not grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> to Internet code, except with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>可以提供访问非公共类型和成员，我们建议你不要授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>到 Internet 的代码，除非包含<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess> allows access to non-public members, with the restriction that the grant set of the non-public members must be equal to, or a subset of, the grant set of the code that accesses the non-public members.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess> 允许访问非公共成员，与非公共成员的授予集必须等于，限制或的代码访问非公共成员的授予集的子集。

trans-unit.source: Certain features of reflection emit, such as emitting debug symbols, require <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 反射的某些功能发出，如发出调试符号，要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.ReflectionEmit?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> class with either fully restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的完全受限制或不受限制的权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to metadata.
trans-unit.target: 创建完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`访问元数据。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> class with the specified access.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的访问权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="flag" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flag" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 与原始权限情况下，一份权限表示对资源的相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Copy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Copy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of reflection allowed for the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许用于当前权限的反射类型。

trans-unit.source: The set flags for the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的设置标志。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Flags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Flags%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将此属性设置为无效值。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" /> for the valid values.
trans-unit.target: 要查阅有效值，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.FromXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.FromXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数不是有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 参数的版本号无效。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Intersect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Intersect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 权限的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.ToXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.ToXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Union%2A>是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Union%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission.Union%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>类。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="other" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> 参数不是 <see langword="null" />，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。
